repliclust.base.DistributionMix¶

class repliclust.base.DistributionMix¶

Base class for assigning probability distributions to clusters in a mixture model.

assign_distributions(n_clusters)

Methods

assign_distributions(n_clusters)

Assign probability distributions to all clusters in a mixture model.
